title: 2 Weeks Free! North Beach 1x1 Renovated, Walk to Wash Square Park
posting_body: *Promotion - 2 Weeks Free Rent!
Eat Pray Rent 28 Houston: North Beach 1/1 by RentingSF
RentingSF.co proudly presents North Beach original 1/1 with updated gourmet kitchen with island counter.
Make memorable meals and enjoy the good life at 28 Houston off Columbus.
Let there be light in spacious mid-century modern apartment on this cul-de-sac located a quick walk from such renowned restaurants as Tony's Pizzeria Napoletana, Original Joe's & Victoria Bakery.
Walk to North Beach Library and Pool, St Peter &;; Paul Church, Washington Square and Aquatic Park.
Immediate occupancy.
Tails of the City pets Ok with Owner Approval.
RentingSF.co established 2004.
* Eat pray rent this North Beach upscale update - Holy Cannoli !!
* Mid century update with upscale renovated kitchen - island counter
